org.cleverbus.spi.alerts
Interface AlertListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmailAlertListenerSupport
public interface AlertListener

Listener notifies when any alert is activated.

Since:
0.4
Author:
Petr Juza

Method Summary
 void onAlert(AlertInfo alert, long actualCount)
          Notifies that specified alert is activated.
 boolean supports(AlertInfo alert)
          Does this listener support the specified alert?
 

Method Detail

supports

boolean supports(AlertInfo alert)
Does this listener support the specified alert?

Returns:
true if specified alert is supported by this listener otherwise false

Notifies that specified alert is activated.

Parameters:
alert - the alert
actualCount - the actual count of items
